interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Pre-Tox Peel Off Antioxidant Face Mask with Alpha Hydroxy Acids, Vitamin E & Blackberry Complex, Non-Comedogenic, Paraben- & Phthalate-Free, 0.35 oz (Pack of 3) Review Date: 2019/11/05 Store: Aveeno Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Aveeno', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliator,Exfoliate', 'Scent': 'Blackberry', 'Material Type Free': 'Phthalate-free,Paraben-free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.28 x 3.62 x 0.47 inches; 1.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '191567912414'} Review Text: Never has a peel off mask removed a layer of skin.
Be very careful.
I’m always able to use them to this area which is the high cheek not the under eye.
Never any issues before with other products but for some reason this one it was. Review Title: Very agressive peel off mask which took skin with it. Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------

Bought these because I'm extra sensitive on cheeks. Great [KARADIUM] PUCCA LOVE EDITION Cheek & Shading 5.4g - 5 Colors (#03 BABY PINK) {'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.3 x 2.3 x 0.4 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '887406060773'} Nice smooth texture and good payoff with finger swatch. Very nice girlish colour. No smell. Five Stars Soap for Geeks - BEST SELLER! 6 oz Soap by Whiskey River Soap Co. Whiskey River Soap Co. {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Whiskey River Soap Co.', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '6 Ounce', 'Product Dimensions': '7.4 x 3.9 x 2.5 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GEE-S', 'UPC': '687437825361'} Smells so good Yummy Holika Holika [Sweet Peko Edition] Peko Melty Jelly Blusher Tint 03 Melting Strawberry … HOLIKA HOLIKA {'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Brand': 'HOLIKA HOLIKA', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '1.9 x 1.8 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} The pot is three times the size it needs to be.
The product fills up about 1/4.
Seems like there is way too little product for the cost. Deceitful photo describing product. Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Pre-Tox Peel Off Antioxidant Face Mask with Alpha Hydroxy Acids, Vitamin E & Blackberry Complex, Non-Comedogenic, Paraben- & Phthalate-Free, 0.35 oz (Pack of 3) Aveeno {'Brand': 'Aveeno', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliator,Exfoliate', 'Scent': 'Blackberry', 'Material Type Free': 'Phthalate-free,Paraben-free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.28 x 3.62 x 0.47 inches; 1.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '191567912414'} Never has a peel off mask removed a layer of skin.
Be very careful.
I’m always able to use them to this area which is the high cheek not the under eye.
Never any issues before with other products but for some reason this one it was. Very agressive peel off mask which took skin with it.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare and Makeup Enthusiast:** Actively engages with both skincare and makeup products, reflecting an interest in enhancing beauty while prioritizing skin health.
- **Sensitivity-Savvy Skincare Focus:** Values gentle and effective solutions, particularly around sensitive areas like the cheeks, as demonstrated by recent experiences highlighting adverse reactions to certain products.
- **Quality-Conscious Purchaser:** Displays a strong preference for high-quality items, now increasingly sensitive to product performance and value, especially in terms of packaging and size.
- **Integrated Beauty Routine:** Maintains a comprehensive beauty regimen that includes regular skincare and makeup application, underscoring a holistic self-care approach.
- **Diverse Product Appreciation:** Shows no gender bias in product selections, favoring options that address a variety of needs.
- **Critical but Fair Review Giver:** Recently exhibited a heightened level of scrutiny in reviews, marking a transition towards a more discerning and critical stance on product efficacy and consequences.
- **Positive Experience Recognition:** Typically acknowledges satisfaction with purchases; however, there is a growing emphasis on transparency and value in recent evaluations.
- **Scent-Minded Selection:** Continues to appreciate fragrant products, indicating a strong engagement with sensory attributes, though recent experiences with aggressive formulations have shaped caution in product choices.

Overall, the user seeks effective, quality solutions for skincare and makeup, with an emphasis on gentle formulations that respect skin sensitivity while being increasingly vigilant about product value and safety in their beauty routine.
